snippet: An index of purchasing managers showed that activity in the 17-nation currency zone declined through September after dropping in the second quarter.
abstract: Markit Economics notes its survey of purchasing managers showed business activity and new orders in the 17-nation euro zone fell in third quarter after dropping in second quarter; says region is most likely in recession.

byline.contributor: David Jolly contributed reporting from Paris.

lead_paragraph: An index of purchasing managers showed that activity in the 17-nation currency zone declined through September after dropping in the second quarter.

headline.seo: Survey Signals That Euro Zone Has Fallen Into Recession
headline.main: Survey Signals That Euro Zone Has Entered Recession
headline.print_headline: Survey Signals That Euro Zone Has Entered Recession
